body:
Day 18 - Manga 419*
That blue effect hurt my eyes, wouldn't want to look at it for more than five seconds so that's a minus.
The art was kinda acceptable so...
2/10.
I don't like the blue tint 5/10
If you are reading this comment your parents will die within 5 years. To undo this curse you need to copy this and paste it on 5 other manga. i'm so, so sorry,please forgive me
